dialogue-text:
You are a hero set on killing The Bad Monster(tm). 
 After countless defeats you've decided to put away your sword in its sheath to embark on a journey of study.

What better way for success 
 than to meticulously study your enemy's weaknesses?
Go forth and try your best to focus. \n Your dignity is on the line.

Victory! 

 Congratulations! You defeated this monster. 

 What do you wish to do next?
Defeat \n\n You failed to defeat this monster. Try again after another study session!
